title: Minimum Flips To Make A Or B Equal To C
description:
Given 3 positives numbers a, b and c. Return the minimum flips required in some bits of a and b to make ( a OR b == c ). (bitwise OR operation).\r
Flip operation consists of change any single bit 1 to 0 or change the bit 0 to 1 in their binary representation.\r
\r
 \r
Example 1:\r
\r
\r
\r
\r
Input: a = 2, b = 6, c = 5\r
Output: 3\r
Explanation: After flips a = 1 , b = 4 , c = 5 such that (a OR b == c)\r
\r
Example 2:\r
\r
\r
Input: a = 4, b = 2, c = 7\r
Output: 1\r
\r
\r
Example 3:\r
\r
\r
Input: a = 1, b = 2, c = 3\r
Output: 0\r
\r
\r
 \r
Constraints:\r
\r
\r
	1 <= a <= 10^9\r
	1 <= b <= 10^9\r
	1 <= c <= 10^9\r
starter_code:
class Solution:
    def minFlips(self, a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
preamble:

check_function:
def check(candidate):
    assert candidate(a = 10,b = 15,c = 25) == 4
    assert candidate(a = 2,b = 6,c = 5) == 3
    assert candidate(a = 1,b = 2,c = 3) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 8,b = 3,c = 11) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 4,b = 2,c = 7) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 1000000000,b = 1000000000,c = 1) == 27
    assert candidate(a = 123,b = 456,c = 789) == 9
    assert candidate(a = 1000000007,b = 1000000009,c = 1000000011) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 8388607,b = 16777215,c = 16777215) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 65535,b = 65535,c = 65535) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 987654321,b = 123456789,c = 864197532) == 20
    assert candidate(a = 123456789,b = 987654321,c = 135792468) == 25
    assert candidate(a = 1048575,b = 2097151,c = 3145727) == 2
    assert candidate(a = 123456789,b = 987654321,c = 1234567890) == 26
    assert candidate(a = 255,b = 128,c = 254) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 894967295,b = 1073741823,c = 2147483647) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 255,b = 255,c = 0) == 16
    assert candidate(a = 16777215,b = 33554431,c = 67108863) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 1023,b = 511,c = 1535) == 2
    assert candidate(a = 1023,b = 2047,c = 3071) == 2
    assert candidate(a = 1073741824,b = 536870912,c = 1610612736) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 255,b = 128,c = 383) == 3
    assert candidate(a = 987654,b = 321456,c = 654321) == 9
    assert candidate(a = 987654321,b = 348712387,c = 1) == 30
    assert candidate(a = 2147483647,b = 0,c = 2147483647) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 777,b = 888,c = 999) == 6
    assert candidate(a = 123456789,b = 987654321,c = 999999999) == 10
    assert candidate(a = 134217728,b = 67108864,c = 201326592) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 15,b = 30,c = 45) == 4
    assert candidate(a = 1023,b = 512,c = 1024) == 12
    assert candidate(a = 123456789,b = 987654321,c = 1000000000) == 16
    assert candidate(a = 123456789,b = 987654321,c = 987654321) == 7
    assert candidate(a = 134217727,b = 67108863,c = 201326592) == 53
    assert candidate(a = 1000000000,b = 1,c = 1000000001) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 32,b = 16,c = 48) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 14,b = 28,c = 42) == 4
    assert candidate(a = 8,b = 3,c = 15) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 999,b = 888,c = 777) == 8
    assert candidate(a = 2147483647,b = 2147483647,c = 0) == 62
    assert candidate(a = 1000000,b = 999999,c = 1000001) == 5
    assert candidate(a = 1073741823,b = 536870912,c = 805306368) == 28
    assert candidate(a = 8,b = 16,c = 24) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 1048575,b = 524287,c = 1572863) == 2
    assert candidate(a = 1000000000,b = 999999999,c = 1000000000) == 9
    assert candidate(a = 2147483647,b = 2147483647,c = 1) == 60
    assert candidate(a = 1000000000,b = 500000000,c = 1000000001) == 8
    assert candidate(a = 1023,b = 512,c = 768) == 8
    assert candidate(a = 134217727,b = 268435455,c = 335544319) == 4
    assert candidate(a = 897,b = 564,c = 231) == 6
    assert candidate(a = 511,b = 255,c = 127) == 3
    assert candidate(a = 134217727,b = 268435455,c = 536870911) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 1023,b = 511,c = 255) == 3
    assert candidate(a = 536870911,b = 268435455,c = 805306367) == 2
    assert candidate(a = 255,b = 511,c = 1023) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 255,b = 128,c = 191) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 1000000000,b = 1000000000,c = 500000000) == 21
    assert candidate(a = 1000000000,b = 500000000,c = 1500000000) == 14
    assert candidate(a = 65535,b = 131071,c = 262143) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 500,b = 600,c = 700) == 3
    assert candidate(a = 2147483647,b = 2147483647,c = 4294967295) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 65535,b = 32768,c = 98304) == 16

    assert candidate(a = 65535,b = 65535,c = 131071) == 1
    assert candidate(a = 89,b = 67,c = 45) == 6
    assert candidate(a = 1,b = 1023,c = 1023) == 0
    assert candidate(a = 858993459,b = 2576980377,c = 1717986918) == 32
